channel.title: How do you make all the players know when you kill something
channel.description:
Hey, Could someone give me the code or tell me how to make it so your server sends a message to everyone when you kill an NPC.
For example if i killed a Greater Demon Everyone would know i killed one.

item.title: How do you make all the players know when you kill something
item.dc:creator: @Sin2 Sin_
item.description:
@Sin2 wrote:

[quote=“supra s, post:2, topic:155887”]this will be a part you will need for it ( with other text ect… )

PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" has logged in! There is now "+PlayerHandler.getPlayerCount() + " players.";

I lyke spam…

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make all the players know when you kill something

item.title: How do you make all the players know when you kill something
item.dc:creator: @xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx xXx JAVA OWNZ U xXx
item.description:
@xXx_JAVA_OWNZ_U_xXx wrote:

[quote=“× Java Guru ×, post:3, topic:155887”]if(npcs[i].npcType == /*NPCID*/ && npcs[i].IsDead == true) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" killed MONSTER!"; }[/quote]

hmm he looks new you should add to this were he should add it to =p

Read full topic
item.source: How do you make all the players know when you kill something

item.title: How do you make all the players know when you kill something
item.dc:creator: @x_Java_Guru_x × Java Guru ×
item.description:
@x_Java_Guru_x wrote:

if(npcs[i].npcType == /*NPCID*/ && npcs[i].IsDead == true) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+" killed MONSTER!"; }

In NPCHandler.process
